markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vibration Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2908) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon gains [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) as an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) with a range of 30 feet. If [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=168), it gains [wavesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=41) as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet instead. If [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=207), it gains both.
name: Vibration Sense
